briefdescription.para: Input: File containing means of mixture gaussians
Input: File containing variances of mixture gaussians
Input: Floor value to be applied to variances
Read mixture gaussian codebooks from the given files.

detaileddescription.para: Allocate memory space needed for them. Apply the specified variance floor value. Return value: ptr to the model created; NULL if error. (See Sphinx3 model file-format documentation.)
